#summary This page guides how to customize Site Images and Site logo.
http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/imageCustomize.jpg

= Introduction =

Administrators can use their customized images as site logo and site images by replacing the existing images placed in the site.

= Uploading own images =

  # All the existing site images are kept in the Images library on the site.
  # Any custom images that needs to be used needs to be uploaded in this list. Steps for the same are as below:
    
    * Open the site, Click Site Actions > View All Site Content
http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/ViewAllSiteContent.jpg
    * Click on Images library
http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/ImagesList.jpg  
    * You can upload your custom images in this library.

= Changing Site Logo =

  # Click on Site Actions from the top left of the site and select Site Settings.
http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/SiteSettings.jpg 
  # Click "Title, description, and icon" under the Look and Feel section on the Site Settings page
http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/LookAndFeel.jpg 
  # Enter your logo URL location and a description â€“ you can even click to test the URL to see if the address works.
http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/testURL.jpg 
  # Click Ok and you will be taken back to the Site Settings page where you should now see your logo displayed in the top of the site!
http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/logoChanged.jpg 

Similarly other site images can be modified according to the requirements.
